Release Notes
=============

Version 0.0.2
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**Release Date**: December 2024

This is a placeholder release while we prepare the full repo-sapiens package for release.

**Features**

- Basic greeting functionality (greet, get_greeting)
- Full type hints and docstrings
- Comprehensive documentation
- Package structure in place

**Status**

This release reserves the repo-sapiens package name and tests the PyPI distribution workflow. The complete automation suite will be available in the coming weeks.

**Supported Python Versions**

- Python 3.8
- Python 3.9
- Python 3.10
- Python 3.11
- Python 3.12

Coming in Future Releases
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**Next Release (0.1.0)**

- Repository automation features
- Configuration management system
- Git integration utilities
- Enhanced API design

**Planned Features**

- Template rendering engine
- Credential management system
- CLI interface
- Comprehensive automation workflows

Version 0.0.1
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**Initial placeholder release**

Upgrading
~~~~~~~~~

To upgrade to the latest version:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install --upgrade repo-sapiens

Breaking Changes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Currently, no breaking changes between versions.

- Full feature set not yet implemented
